Get NWPS system monitoring status

Source: R/nwps_monitor.R
nwps_monitor.Rd

Retrieves system health and data status information from the NWPS API, including gauge flood statistics, HML (Hydrologic Message Language) processing stats, and LRO (Long Range Outlook) data status.

Usage

nwps_monitor()

Value

A list containing:

gauge_observed

A tibble with counts of gauges by observed flood category

gauge_forecast

A tibble with counts of gauges by forecast flood category

hml_job_queue

Integer count of jobs in the HML processing queue

hml_product_counts

A tibble with HML product counts by time period

hml_last_received

A tibble with timestamps of last HML receipt by WFO

lro

A tibble with current LRO count and interval

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
status <- nwps_monitor()
status$gauge_observed
status$hml_product_counts
} # }
